entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse Team Trump are "sticking it" to all Americans, with 1,133,069 confirmed COVID-19 cases in the US, an estimated 15 times that many being infected at one time or another and 67,067 deaths and counting, 90% avoidable according to experts had they only acted on time.
